import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' class CourseList extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) } state = {course : []} componentDidMount(){ axios.get('http://localhost:8000/courses/listCourses') .then(response => { alert(JSON.stringify(response.data)); this.setState({course: response.data.courses}) }) .catch(error => { console.log(error); }); } render(){ var courseList = this.state.course; return (

Course List

{courseList.map(t=> )}
Photo Course Name Description Duration
{t.name} {t.description} {t.duration}
{/* */}

Edit your Course

) } } export default CourseList;
